steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the location in the document where you want to add the endnote.
Click on the 'References' tab in the Word ribbon.
In the 'Footnotes' group, click on the 'Insert Endnote' button.
A superscript number will be added at the location in the document and the cursor will move to the end of the document.
Type the content of the endnote at the end of the document.
To return to the location of the endnote in the document, double-click on the superscript number.
Make any necessary edits to the endnote content.
Save the changes to the document.
